item.title: Using Domain Controller Account Passwords To HashDump Domains
item.description: Since I follow both Carlos Perez and Benjamin Delpy on Twitter, something caught my eye on August 2nd, soon after Benjamin Delpy drops DCSync: @Carlos_Perez haha, if yes, it will be a 0d ;) No, like always it needs some rights ;) DA is cool, maybe DC$ is enough — ü•ù Benjamin Delpy (@gentilkiwi) August 2, 2015 And then later on August 28th, again about the DC$ account (Domain Controller computer account):
